info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 8:25PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A thunderstorm producing heavy rain will impact portions of central McDonough County through 930 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy rain producing thunderstorm near Macomb. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on area roadways, and low lying areas will result in impacts to travel. Locations impacted include... Macomb, Bardolph, Western Illinois University, McDonough County 4-H Grounds and Pennington Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. If the heavy rain continues, a flash flood warning may be needed. Be sure to not drive through flooded roadways. Report any water issues to local law enforecement.
